official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a refundable credit to certain senior citizens for premiums paid for coverage under Medicare Part B.
short_title: Notch Baby Health Care Relief Act of 1999
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Notch Baby Health Care Relief Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a credit for premiums paid by a "notch baby" under part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act. Amends such part B to eliminate the part B premium penalty for a "notch baby."

titles.title: Notch Baby Health Care Relief Act of 1999
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a refundable credit to certain senior citizens for premiums paid for coverage under Medicare Part B.
